# ChainPort - Universal EVM→Solana Migration Suite

## Project Overview
ChainPort is a comprehensive migration suite for converting EVM smart contracts to Solana, including AI-powered code translation, automated state migration, and analytics.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- AI: OpenAI GPT-4 for Solidity→Rust/Anchor conversion
- Blockchain: Solana Web3.js, Anchor, ethers.js
- Bridge: Wormhole/Sunrise integration
- Real-time: WebSocket updates
- Charts: Recharts
- Syntax: Prism.js

## Key Features
1. Smart contract analyzer with AST parsing
2. AI-powered Solidity to Rust/Anchor converter
3. Wallet migration tool (MetaMask→Phantom/Solflare)
4. Token bridge interface
5. Live migration analytics dashboard
6. Real-time progress tracking

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on hackathon-quality code
- Prioritize user experience and visual polish
- Include comprehensive error handling
- Add loading states and progress indicators
- Ensure mobile responsiveness
